nodes.text: I know my boys have taken up with some poor sorts, but you’re the worst yet. I just can’t believe that you let them down. I won’t have you in my place. Now, get out.
We don't want your kind around here.
The special baths that we have available vary in cost by the amount of time that the gal spends with you, and any special services that you take advantage of.
You could use a bit of real scrubbing; don’t you tribals know about soap? Oh well, that’ll cost you $70 for the Brief Full Body Wash...but I’m sure that you’ll be happy with the results.
Before we go any further, you’ve gotta know that the baths are for individuals, not groups. You can make your own arrangements, and then your friends can do as they please on their own.
My name’s ‘Big Nose’ Sally Dunton and I’m the owner of this here bathhouse. I’m afraid that we just have girl bath attendants here. That alright with you?

I’m certain that one of my sons would be happy to help you out. But you might want to come back here afterwards; most gals that spend any time with my boys get a hankerin’ to bathe themselves real  good.
I think you’ll really enjoy this.

Hmm, I don’t know if Jenny will even take you in the condition that you’re in. You’re going to need a thorough, no-nonsense, scrubbing first. (To herself: I wonder if Gerda is free for that?) With the cost of the pre-scrubbing, the Round-the-World Full Squeaky Clean Servicing is yours for only $185.
I think any of our girls would be happy to give you a full body wash; I just better watch the time to make sure it’s a brief one (chuckle). The Brief Full Body Wash will cost you $55.
Well I’m sure that your Round-the–World trip Servicing with beautiful Jenny will be an experience that you’ll savor for quite a while. A real bargain at only $125.
If you just want an unattended bath, you might try the Golden Gecko or the Buckner House. But I doubt that you’ll find that as enjoyable.
My name’s Sally Dunton, but mostly they call me Big Nose Sally. I’m the owner of this here bathhouse. We have a whole hassleful of special, attended baths for you to pick from.
I know you’re a tribal and all, but this is a bathhouse, not an outhouse. Git out afore I have  you thrown out!
We don’t handle that sort of thing here. Try talking to my sons, Chuck and Buck Dunton. I understand that their brahmin are pretty darn popular with a certain set.
It seems as though your eyes are bigger than your budget. Perhaps you’d like to try a cheaper  washing.
Hello there, my name’s Sally Dunton. Hmm, did you catch that?
I think that you’ll enjoy Jenny bathing you more than any bath you’ve ever had.
I’m sorry that we couldn’t help you out. Come on back later, though.
Well now, it wouldn’t be fair to discount any of our services. My gals are well worth what they  charge.

The baths that we have available are: a Wash Cloth Hand Wipe, a brief Full Body Wash, and, lastly, the Round-the-World Full Squeaky Clean Servicing, offered by the beautiful and talented Jenny, recently trained at the finest house in the Den.
No, you have to choose one at a time, but you can always come back for more -- usually  after a brief rest.
Well, that’s a right nice try for an idjit. But I ain’t having none of your kind in here. Now,  git out. Shoo, shoo.
That’s a great choice, if you don’t have a lot of time or money.
Well, for an attractive individual like yourself that would only cost $25.
Hmm, you look as though you need a real bath first; that’ll make the price $35.
You don’t have enough money. Come back when you’re able to pay.
Back again, huh? A lot of folks just can’t seem to get clean enough.

links.text: You mean I get to be with a real-live girl? Sign me up!
I don’t think I’m ready for this; I better go.
I don’t think that I want to pay for a bath after all.
Wow, $70! That seems like a lot. But I bet it’s worth it. I’ll try it.
What were the other bathing options?
Ok.
I don’t think this is what I was looking for.
I’m just here for a bath.
Gee, I was really looking for a male attendant.
Women suit me just fine.
Is Gerda that larger, mustachioed woman? I better hear the other choices again.
I get both Gerda and Jenny? What a bargain! Here’s my $185.
I don’t think that I can afford this right now. I think I’m going to leave.
Hmm, what are the other choices again?
That sounds like fun. Here’s my $55.
Thanks, but I think that I’ll save my money for now.
I don’t think that I’ll ever need $125 worth of cleaning. I’m going to leave before I get  myself into trouble.
I can’t wait to enjoy Jenny’s special talents. Here’s my $125.
Maybe I should hear about the other bath choices again.
I was just kidding; I’d like a special bath.
Thanks, Miss Big Nose. I’ll try that instead. Good-bye.
I think I’ve changed my mind; I may try back later.
What kind of special, attended baths do you have here?
Gee, Miss Sally, I just wanted a regular bath. You don’t have a bubble bath, do you?
Ally Onion? Gurk?
I gotta pee-ee
I guess that’s fair enough. Tell me what baths you have available.
Well, if I can’t get a discount, I’m leaving.
What about getting a discount on those baths?
I like the idea of a Full Body Wash; what’s that going to cost?
I think I can get by with the Hand Wipe; how much is that?
Can I mix and match the different types of baths?
Beautiful and talented? I’ve got to hear more about the Round-the-World Full Squeaky Clean Wash.
I don’t think I’m ready to take a bath with someone else watching; I’m going to leave.
Tell me the different types of bath again.
If I can’t make my own combinations, I don’t even want a bath; I’m outta here.
Maybe I don’t need this right now. I’m leaving.
$25? That’s a bargain; I’ll take it.
Hmm, tell me about the other types of baths again.
What are the other choices again?
$35? That seems kind of steep -- but I guess I am a bit scruffy. I’ll take it.
$35 seems kind of expensive; got any cute brahmin, instead?
Thanks, but I think I’ll look elsewhere.
I’m just looking around this time; I don’t need a bath.
Do I get a return customer discount?
Tell me the types of bath that you have again.
